metadata.synopsis: The mindflayer can't find any targets and approaches a nearby player and attacks them.
metadata.how_to_trigger: BGO_Main_AReCon: oe Windmill_MF_WaitForPlayerteleport to S_WYR_Windmill_Frontdoor and wait for MF

3.speaker: Mind Flayer
3.text: There is nothing here! Not a single creature with a mind worth feeding on. Except...

1.speaker: Mind Flayer
1.text: I am sure you have given much to help my people, but if I am to survive, you will be required to give more.
1.context: NodeContext: Mindflayer is going to eat the player

0.speaker: Mind Flayer
0.text: Sometimes for one to survive, another must perish. And as you have yet to mature to your true form, my survival takes precedent.
0.context: NodeContext: Mindflayer is going to eat the player

2.speaker: Mind Flayer
2.text: There is no shame in feeling fear. You will only taste the sweeter for it.
2.context: NodeContext: Mindflayer is going to eat the player
